text:
Ogilvy has engaged Olivia Brown to provide services for the Smart fashion Series on behalf of Cotton On. With the rise of fashion innovation in Australia, Australians are seeking better fashion options. As the campaign's content creator, Olivia Brown will deliver key messages on media and social channels. This campaign reinforces the brand's leadership in fashion.

INFLUENCER AGREEMENT

This agreement is between Cotton On and the Influencer for Cotton On Fashion Campaign 2025.

COMMERCIAL TERMS:
- Total Fee: $18,868 AUD (inclusive of GST)
- Payment Terms: Net 30 days from invoice date
- Invoice Requirements: Tax invoice required upon completion

DELIVERABLES:
- 2 x Instagram posts

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- Engagement Period: 3 months
- Exclusivity Period: 6 weeks
- Territory: Australia
- Usage Rights: 18 months from campaign launch
- Content Rights: Cotton On retains full commercial rights

COMPLIANCE:
- All content must comply with ACMA guidelines and ASA codes
- Content is subject to client approval before publication
- Disclosure requirements must be met per ACCC guidelines

LEGAL:
This agreement is governed by Australian law and subject to the jurisdiction of Australian courts.

Agreed terms are subject to final contract execution.
labels: profile_Rexona _ WBD Foot Model Talent Agreement
